Name: Mirai Fury
Description:
Manufacturer: Mirai
Focus: Snub Fighter

Featuring best-in-class maneuverability and fully integrated, cutting-edge Xi’an tech, the next-generation Fury snub fighter from Mirai uses its four halo-mounted size 2 laser repeaters to redefine short-range space combat.
